DOC.criteria: age 4060 Participants exclude : 1 . Are unwilling participate weight control program include weight coach . 2 . Report able walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop . 3 . Are participate weight loss program , take weight loss medication , history bariatric surgery , lose â‰¥ 5 % body weight past 6months . 4 . Are pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum plan become pregnant time intervention . 5 . Report heart condition , chest pain period rest activity , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) . Participants report joint problem , medication use , medical condition may limit ability exercise require obtain write permission physician participate intervention . 6 . Report condition , judgment PI , would render participant unlikely follow study protocol ( e.g. , terminal illness , relocation , substance abuse , bulimia nervosa , dementia , severe psychiatric condition ) .
